description: Detects when when a mounted share is removed. Adversaries may remove share connections that are no longer useful in order to clean up traces of their operation
false_positives: Administrators or Power users may remove their shares via cmd line
name: Mounted Share Deleted
query: ((process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("net.exe" OR "net1.exe")) AND (process.command_line:*share* AND process.command_line:*\/delete*))
author: oscd.community
@redcanary
Zach Stanford @svch0st
